name: Msp430-reflow-oven
tagline: Oh my, oven is with "V", not with "W".
body:
===What it is=== Firmware for my simple reflow-owen controller. ===Build=== 
git clone https://github.com/iwasz/msp430-reflow-owen.git
cd msp430-reflow-owen/build
# Edit configure.sh so it points to MSP-ware
./configure.sh
make 
make upload
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
